tags: Wait time,
review:
This Doctor is awesome. We have done Total knee replacement for my mother 4 years ago for both legs. Now for my mother in law too for one leg. The care and concern shown by the doctor is worth Mentioning. His team also so good enough that the patients are so convenient. He treats his patients as guests. 

Anyone with any ortho issues this doctor can be on your no 1 prefrence list

tags: None
review: Had knee joint replacement of my grand mother who is around 75 done by the doctor , he patienly explained everything about the surgery and convinced my grand mother to get the surgery done, the surgery  was done without any problems and post operative care was also very good and he would personally see that the patient does the exercises. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
This  Dr. especially for hip joint is very good. I admitted my father aged 81 years old  to  BGS Global  for the treatment of fracture in hip joint on left side, Dr.Basavaraj given us the confidence that the operation will be done in such way that patient will be  walking with help of walker in very next day . So we given a consent to do the operation. And as per the promise given by Dr Basavaraj & team the very next daymy father is able to walk with walker.And after two days they discharged the  patient also. Now after 6 weeks of time my father is ok and he can do his works himself without any help of us . I am very great full to the Dr. Basavarj & his team  Dr. Basavaraj speciality is that once he agreed to do the operation  he will ask the patient walk very next day & it gives lot of confidence to the patient & the patient automatically recovered very fast

Once again convey my  sincere gratitude to Dr Basavaraj & team    

Thank you Dr

review: the patient was expriencing pain in hip n knees for the past about three years. Other two three Ortho surgeon's had not diagnosis propetly. Hence Very good way of diagnosis and treatment by Dr.Basavaraj, and other doctors at cardiology, pulmonary and physician.

review: I liked the doctor but when I booked an appointment it showed me 350 as consultation but when I went to hospital they took 500 you said 30 mins or less wait time but when we went doctor was busy and we waited for 1 hour please try to improve and advise why we charged more
